Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DFT532 (Synthetic AMPs, DFTamP1 variant, Leu-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature.Author: Mishra B, Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Lushnikova T, Wang X, Wang G. 2019
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2019 Jul 2;116(27):13517-13522. doi: 10.1073/pnas.1821410116.PubMed
Literature.Title: Low cationicity is important for systemic in vivo efficacy of database-derived peptides against drug-resistant Gram-positive pathogens

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (85.71%) toDFT531. L: 62%.Chemical modification:  C-terminal amidation.Activity: Active against S. aureus USA300 (MIC 1.6 uM), P-aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC > 25 uM), E-coli ATCC 25922 (MIC> 25 uM), and K-pneumonia ATCC13883 (MIC > 25 uM).Toxicity:  human RBC HC50 13 uM, highly hemolytic.
